解.definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old); variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)

解㑊.definition: (TCM) fatigue, often associated with muscle atony and emaciation

解乏.definition: to relieve tiredness; to freshen up

解僱.definition: to fire; to sack; to dismiss; to terminate employment

解元.definition: first-placed candidate in the provincial imperial examinations (old)

解免.definition: to avoid (difficulties); to open up a siege

解凍.definition: to melt; to thaw; to defrost; fig. to relax (repression, enmity etc)

解剖.definition: to dissect (an animal); to analyze; anatomy

解剖麻雀.definition: to dissect a sparrow; (fig.) to examine a typical case as the basis for making a generalization

解勸.definition: to soothe; to pacify; to mollify; to mediate (in a dispute etc)

解吸.definition: to de-absorb; to get a chemical out of solution

解和.definition: to mediate (in a conflict); to pacify

解嘲.definition: to try to cover up in an embarrassing situation; to justify oneself; to find excuses

解嚴.definition: to lift restrictions (such as curfew or martial law)

解囊.definition: lit. to loosen one's purse; fig. to give generously to help others

解圍.definition: to lift a siege; to help sb out of trouble or embarrassment

解密.definition: to declassify; (computing) to decrypt; to decipher

解封.definition: to lift a ban; to end a lockdown

解悟.definition: to understand; to comprehend; to grasp the meaning

解悶.definition: to relieve boredom or melancholy; a diversion

解惑.definition: to dispel doubts; to clear up confusion

解手.definition: to relieve oneself (i.e. use the toilet); to solve

解放.definition: to liberate; to emancipate; liberation; refers to the Communists' victory over the Nationalists in 1949; CL:次[ci4]

解放區.definition: Liberation city district; Jiefang district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan

解放巴勒斯坦人民陣線.pinyin: Jie3 fang4 Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Ren2 min2 Zhen4 xian4
解放巴勒斯坦人民陣線.definition: Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine

解放後.definition: after liberation (i.e. after the Communist's victory); after the establishment of PRC in 1949

解放戰爭.definition: War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石

解放日.definition: Liberation Day; cf Japan's surrender on 15th August 1945, celebrated as Liberation Day in Korea

解救.definition: to rescue; to help out of difficulties; to save the situation

解數.definition: talent; ability; capability; martial arts technique; Taiwan pr. [jie3 shu4]

解析.definition: to analyze; to resolve; (math.) analysis; analytic

解析函數.definition: (math.) an analytic function (of a complex variable)

解毒.definition: to detoxify; to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)

解民倒懸.definition: lit. to rescue the people from hanging upside down (idiom, from Mencius); to save the people from dire straits

解氣.definition: to assuage one's anger; gratifying (esp. to see sb get their comeuppance)

解決.definition: to solve; to resolve; to settle (a problem); to eliminate; to wipe out (an enemy, bandits etc)

解決辦法.definition: solution; method to settle an issue

解法.definition: solution (to a math problem); method of solving

解深密經.definition: Sandhinir mokcana vyuha sutra, a yogic text on awareness and meditation, translated as the Wisdom of Buddha

解理.definition: cleavage (splitting of minerals such as slate along planes)

解甲.definition: to remove armor; to return to civilian life

解甲歸田.definition: to remove armor and return to the farm; to return to civilian life

解疑.definition: to dispel doubts; to remove ambiguities

解疑釋惑.definition: (idiom) to solve a problem; to resolve a difficult issue

解答.definition: to solve (a problem); to resolve (a difficulty); to provide an answer; solution; resolution; answer

解約.definition: to terminate an agreement; to cancel a contract

解綁.definition: to unbind (e.g. a phone number from an account)

解聘.definition: to dismiss an employee; to sack

解職.definition: to dismiss from office; to discharge; to sack

解脫.definition: to untie; to free; to absolve of; to get free of; to extirpate oneself; (Buddhism) to free oneself of worldly worries

解說.definition: to explain (verbally); to give a running commentary

解說詞.definition: commentary (for a film etc); caption (for a photo etc)

解讀.definition: to decipher; to decode; to interpret

解酒.definition: to dissipate the effects of alcohol

解酲.definition: to sober up; to sleep off the effect of drink

解釋.definition: explanation; to explain; to interpret; to resolve; CL:個|个[ge4]

解釦.definition: to unbutton; (fig.) to solve a dispute

解鈴繫鈴.definition: see 解鈴還須繫鈴人|解铃还须系铃人[jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2]

解鈴還需繫鈴人.pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2
解鈴還需繫鈴人.definition: variant of 解鈴還須繫鈴人|解铃还须系铃人[jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2]

解鈴還須繫鈴人.pinyin: jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2
解鈴還須繫鈴人.definition: lit. whoever hung the bell on the tiger's neck must untie it (idiom); fig. whoever started the trouble should end it

解開.definition: to untie; to undo; to solve (a mystery)

解除.definition: to remove; to sack; to get rid of; to relieve (sb of their duties); to free; to lift (an embargo); to rescind (an agreement)

解離.definition: dissociation; to break up a chemical compound into its elements

解離性人格疾患.pinyin: jie3 li2 xing4 ren2 ge2 ji2 huan4
解離性人格疾患.definition: dissociative identity disorder; multiple personality disorder

解體.definition: to break up into components; to disintegrate; to collapse; to crumble
